extendedInfo.description: The Treaties of the European Union are a set of international treaties between the European Union (EU) member states which sets out the EUâs constitutional basis. These laws serve as the basis of competence in which the EU can act. These treatises can be said to be the equivalent to a formal collective Constitution for member states of the European Union based on mutual agreements and ratifications by member states.This application contains the full, unedited, text of-Treaty on European Union-Treaty on the functioning of the European Union-Protocols, annexes and declarations-Charter Of the Fundamental Rights of the EUThis application also has the following functionalities -Search-ability-Select-ability-Table of Content-Table of Equivalence- Summarised information on each member states of the EU- Instruction guideNow everyone interested in the legal rights and laws of the European Union using an android phone 2.2 and above can find relevant EU legal information at a click of a button. *note*: to have access to all your search results use your scroll button or d-pad.Inputs are highly welcomed.......Enjoy!!!!!!

reviews.title: Great idea
reviews.comment: Thank you! It\'s clear,well structured and useful. It would have been great if it had been in more eu languages, I need it in german. But it\'s great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Almost cryptic way of using it. Far easier to download the PDFs and use Acrobat.
reviews.author: A Google User
